Water Rates
===========

**Billing**

Your bill combines water, sewer, and sanitation (trash, compost, and recycling) on one bill. This reduces operating expenses and helps keep rates lower.

**City Water Rates and Fees**

Rates for water, sewer and garbage service are set by the City Council and are reviewed at times to ensure that city services are adequately being charged for.    
  
For the most up to date information regarding charges for these services, new tap fees, landfill fees, deposit schedules and other fees associated with water, sewer or garbage collection, please see the [fee schedule](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Ordinance%202025-21%20%20Utility%20Rate%20%20Master%20Fee%20%20.pdf?t=202511061200280).
